name: Keep Your Distance for Trijam68
description:
Jump to the rhythm of the song to gain the power to smash the dance floor.

Press Space to jump to the rhythm of the song. When you gain enough points you can smash  the dance floor by jumping and pressing Enter.

This is a small game I did for Trijam 68, It took me about 5 to 6 hours to make.

The theme was "Keep Your Distance", so the game features a dude with a face mask that tries to keep his distance from the people who are approaching him.

The bad guys don't wear face masks to show they don't believe and don't care about COVID19. They approach the dude with the face mask and they are holding their phones. Originally I wanted to write a little dialog bubble above their heads that says that they don't believe that the COVID19 exists, but I didn't have enough time. Hence their phones (and the sync jumping they do) to resemble the brainwash.

If you don't like the game that's fine - it's not a good game. I just wanted to try and do some cool effects and sync music to the gameplay. I didn't have time to actually think about good gameplay and other stuff - But I learned A LOT in the process of making this game!
